message:
SYSTEM: MasterIA_Dic2009.pdf: Página 20
Semantic relatedness between two ontology terms
Level 0: Labels and synonyms
Level 1: OCm Minimal Ontological Context 
E.g.: Java →Island →Land →Thing
Semantic Measures: Relatedness
20
rel0(a, b)  = average of relWeb between synonyms of a and b
rel1(a, b)  = average of rel0 between the elements of the OCm
a and OCm
b
rel (a, b) = linear combination of rel0(a, b) and rel1(a, b)
speaker: SYSTEM
